item.title: How would I send this to a handler
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi,

I had this in my client ( I will add the c. later, and all the imports at the top, but what do I put in my client to redirect it to the handler ):

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14074) { //attack updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(346, absY, absX); stillgfx(427, absY, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Attack."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14077) { //strength updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(482, absY, absX); stillgfx(481, absY, absX); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Strength."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14080) { //defence updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(222, absY, absX); stillgfx(144, absY, absX); stillgfx(391, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Defence."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14095) { //hitpoints updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(444, absY, absX); stillgfx(574, absY, absX); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Hitpoints."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14094) { //hitpoints updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(444, absY, absX); stillgfx(574, absY, absX); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Hitpoints."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14083) { //ranging updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(472, absY, absX); stillgfx(474, absY, absX); stillgfx(20, absY, absX); stillgfx(21, absY, absX); stillgfx(22, absY, absX); stillgfx(23, absY, absX); stillgfx(24, absY, absX); stillgfx(25, absY, absX); stillgfx(26, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Ranging."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14086) { //prayer updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(84, absY, absX); stillgfx(263, absY, absX); stillgfx(264, absY, absX); stillgfx(426, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Prayer."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14089) { //magic updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(409, absY, absX); stillgfx(498, absY, absX); stillgfx(497, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Magic."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14128) { //cooking updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(563, absY +1, absX); setAnimation(883); txt4 = "Im a Master of Cooking."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14134) { //wood updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(187, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Woodcutting."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14110) { //fletch updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(588, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Fletching."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14125) { //fish updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); pEmote = 0x2575; stillgfx(68, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Fishing."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14131) { //firemaking updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(453, absY, absX); stillgfx(446, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Firemaking."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14107) { //crafting updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(239, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Crafting."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14122) { //smithing updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(436, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Smithing."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14119) { //mining updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(287, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Mining."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14101) { //herblore updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(267, absY, absX); stillgfx(255, absY, absX); stillgfx(259, absY, absX); stillgfx(352, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Herblore."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14098) { //agility updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(422, absY, absX); stillgfx(60, absY, absX); stillgfx(62, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Agility."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14104) { //thieving updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(421, absY, absX); stillgfx(143, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Thieving."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14113) { //slayer updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(466, absY, absX); stillgfx(468, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Slayer."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14137) { //farming updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(568, absY, absX); stillgfx(569, absY, absX); stillgfx(593, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Farming."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14092) { //runecrafting updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(111, absY, absX); stillgfx(185, absY, absX); stillgfx(186, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Runecrafting."; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14235) { //Hunter updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(332, absY, absX); stillgfx(247, absY, absX); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); txt4 = "Im a Master of Hunter"; string4UpdateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14139) { //quest updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); stillgfx(332, absY, absX); stillgfx(247, absY, absX); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); stillgfx(111, absY, absX); stillgfx(593, absY, absX); stillgfx(409, absY, absX); stillgfx(498, absY, absX); stillgfx(497, absY, absX); txt4 = "I DID DESERT TRESSURE!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; } }

The void is now in my client, I changed it to this:

public void capeEmote() { { server.skillCapeHandler; }

That is wrong, what do I change it too?

Thanks
